summary: FBI agents, Bullit and Riper are investigating the murder of the young stripper Pamela Rose, found murdered in a hotel room in Bornsville, a small American city without stories.
cast: Kad Merad|Olivier Baroux|Gérard Darmon|Jean-Paul Rouve|Bénédicte Loyen|Lionel Abelanski|Julie Bataille|Manuel Le Lièvre|Greg Germain|François Cluzet|Alain Chabat|Hassen Brahiti|Jean-Noël Brouté|José Exposito|Marina Foïs|Jacques Frantz|Thierry Frémont|Virginie Ledoyen|Jean-Claude Leguay|Xavier Letourneur|Joseph Malerba|Mick Gondouin|Astou Vedel
keywords: reference to silence of the lambs|what happened to epilogue|title appears in song|policeman as villain|run over by train
title: Mais qui a tué Pamela Rose?
